SELECT k.* FROM ( SELECT b.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM ( SELECT a.user_sn , a.user_id , a.user_nm , a.dt_brt , a.user_gndr , a.moblphon_no , a.email_adres , a.rght FROM kjp_user a WHERE 1=1
AND (a.user_nm LIKE '%'||#srch_user_nm#||'%')
AND a.user_gndr = #srch_user_gndr#
ORDER BY a.user_sn ) b ) k
WHERE k.rnum > (#page# - 1) * #rowNum# AND k.rnum <= #page# * #rowNum#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT a.user_sn , a.user_id , a.user_nm , a.dt_brt , a.user_gndr , a.moblphon_no , a.email_adres , a.rght FROM kjp_user a WHERE 1=1
AND (a.user_nm LIKE '%'||#srch_user_nm#||'%')
AND a.user_gndr = #srch_user_gndr#
ORDER BY a.user_sn ) b
SELECT user_sn , user_id , user_nm , dt_brt , user_gndr , moblphon_no , email_adres , rght FROM kjp_user WHERE user_sn = #user_sn#
